mean_en: a large ball of burning gas in space that we see as a point of light in the sky at night; an object, a decoration, a mark, etc., usually with five or six points, whose shape represents a star; a famous and excellent singer, performer, sports player, etc.;  a person who has the main part, or one of the main parts, in a film/movie, play, etc.
sentence_trans: 这里有很多快乐的星星。
